properties.name: fileKey
properties.description: The name of the form element.Defaults to 'file'.

properties.name: fileName
properties.description: The file name to use when saving the file on the server.Defaults to 'image.jpg'.

properties.name: httpMethod
properties.description: The HTTP method to use - either PUT or POST.Defaults to POST.

properties.name: mimeType
properties.description: The mime type of the data to upload.Defaults to image/jpeg.

properties.name: params
properties.description: A set of optional key/value pairs to pass in the HTTP request.

properties.name: chunkedMode
properties.description: Whether to upload the data in chunked streaming mode.Defaults to true.

properties.name: headers
properties.description: A map of header name/header values. Use an array to specify morethan one value. On iOS, FireOS, and Android, if a header namedContent-Type is present, multipart form data will NOT be used.
